bcftools.description: Utilities for variant calling and manipulating VCFs and BCFs

bismark.description: Bismark is a program to map bisulfite treated sequencing reads to a genome of interest and perform methylation calls in a single step.

bowtie.description: An ultrafast, memory-efficient short read aligner.

bowtie2.description: Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences.

bvatools.description: BVATools -- Bam and Variant Analysis Tools

java.description: Java technology is the foundation of most networked applications and is used worldwide to develop and deliver mobile and nested applications, games, web content and enterprise software.

picard.description: Set of tools (in Java) for working with next generation sequencing data in the BAM format

samtools.description: A suite of programs for interacting with high-throughput sequencing data.

star.description: Spliced Transcripts Alignment to a Reference. Based on a previously undescribed RNA-seq alignment algorithm that uses sequential maximum mappable seed search in uncompressed suffix arrays followed by seed clustering and stitching procedure.

tophat.description: TopHat is a fast splice junction mapper for RNA-Seq reads. It aligns RNA-Seq reads to mammalian-sized genomes using the ultra high-throughput short read aligner Bowtie, and then analyzes the mapping results to identify splice junctions between exons.

trimmomatic.description: Trimmomatic performs a variety of useful trimming tasks for illumina paired-end and single ended data.The selection of trimming steps and their associated parameters are supplied on the command line.
